data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Soria that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Soria, Castilla y León, Spain
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Soria, Castilla y León, Spain.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Soria, Castilla y León, Spain who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Soria, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bosniak people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, make the 71,999 people in the county of Soria who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Soria, Castilla y León, Spain to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.section_summary:
the county of Soria, Castilla y León, Spain has a population of 95,100.

We estimate Soria has 1,523 people who might know Jesus, 71,999 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 21,579 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Soria, Castilla y León, Spain.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
